CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Charket__WeChatProfilePhotoUrl__c)), IMAGE( IF( BEGINS(Charket__WeChatProfilePhotoUrl__c, 'https') , Charket__WeChatProfilePhotoUrl__c ,'https' + RIGHT(Charket__WeChatProfilePhotoUrl__c, LEN(Charket__WeChatProfilePhotoUrl__c) - 4 ) ) , 'No Attachment', 100, 100), '')
CustomField.label: Profile Photo
